attributes.action: increase the age limit from 55 to 65 in residental homes
attributes.additional_details:
The age limit for a person to go into a residential home needs to be increased from 55 to 65 , and take into account the increase in the retirement age, and the fact many under 65 (male) are also working in some cases.
With Early retirement being removed by many company's ,and government departments employees this should be taken into account
